function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density leads to higher transmission rates of contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread disease transmission and difficulty in implementing effective social distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health initiatives, promoting social distancing, and sharing resources between municipalities.","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and managing population density, urban planning for creating open spaces and promoting social distancing.","People":"Residents of densely populated areas, public health authorities, urban planners, policymakers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, policymakers, real estate developers, construction industry."},{"Description":"Reluctance of the real estate industry to invest in future-proofed buildings with reduced lifetime costs.","Impact":"Missed opportunity to create healthier and more sustainable built environments, and potential economic loss due to the lack of investment.","Mitigation":"Providing legislative responsibilities and incentives to nudge the real estate industry towards investing in future-proofed buildings, promoting the economic benefits of such investments.","Technologies":"Sustainable building technologies, energy-efficient systems, green building certifications.","People":"Real estate industry professionals, policymakers, investors, residents.","Owner":"Policymakers, government bodies, real estate industry professionals, investors."}]}
